document_data.mainbody:
Tchozals Race was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Tchozals Race was located in the northern section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward. The road originated in the north on the border with the Waterdeep/Sea Ward, branching south and west from Julthoon Street before curving west of the Market to end on Swords Street. Other roads crossing Tchozals Race included Traders Way and Calamastyr Lane.
